name: Bright Focus (for buttons, links, and textboxes)
description:
For more information about this very cool new proposal for a change in the Firefox UI, go to this url: http://diveintomark.org/archives/2006/04/25/new-focus-indicator
Changed the outline color to reflect the new rgba CSS3 color standard supported by Firefox 3+.
Updated the CSS3 property values for Firefox 3.6+.
Vote for this to become default here: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=251198
